comments.text:
When dragging and dropping a tab from a maximized window into the content area, the tab resets itself very quickly to the previous position. However, the window is no longer maximized.

See this screencast:
http://screencast.com/t/jsW3d9wC

comments.raw_text:
STR from bug 851928:
1. Open only one tab
2. Maximize Browser
3. Drag the tab to downward and drop

Actual Results:
 Window switches to normal mode, and the size of window is almost maximized size in Windows.
 Previous size of normal mode is LOST.

Expected Results:
 Window should keep their size and mode.

Triggered by bug 465186. Pushlog_url:
> http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/pushloghtml?fromchange=fb1291a31b54&tochange=29bc151be813
